DOC.detailed_description: This 52-week study consist 16-week randomized placebo-controlled ( RCT , include 12-week Confirmatory Phase ) 36-week open-label extension phase . Of 142 DLB patient enrol RCT phase ( three arm : placebo , 5 mg , 10 mg ) , 110 enter extension phase . The placebo group RCT phase initiate active treatment week 16 , active group maintain allocated treatment dosage week 24 . After week 24 , patient receive 10 mg . Dose reduction 5 mg safety concern allow .
